archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Dispatcher
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
A dispatcher optimises the usage of available connected vehicles according to transport orders. Based on internal or external need for transportation, the Dispatcher selects the optimal vehicle for the task. When the order is due, the vehicle is sent to the pick-up/starting point and drives the planned route to the drop-off/stopping point.
Use in LL and sim: Used in HerÃ¸ya Living Lab for trucks that need an autonomous guiding vehicle to guide them inside the industrial park.
